common.invalid_card_expiration: Expiration date cannot be a past date

signin.please_enter_valid_email: Please enter a valid email address

signup.add_mobile_number_description: We will send you an SMS with a code to verify your mobile phone number.
signup.agree_terms_and_condition: I agree to the terms & conditions
signup.problem_receiving_code_message: Please check your phone number and if you are still facing the problem please email support@b21.io and quote the phone number you are using.

welcome.screenone_description: Hi, we're B21. Our mission is simple. Through the app you hold in your hands presently, we are going to make it easy for you to set a financial or life goal, then invest in cryptocurrency to get there.
welcome.screensecond_description: Through our easy interface, we will guide you every step of the way. We will handle all the technical details so you can easily invest in your goal, see your progress, and reap the rewards when you achieve it!
welcome.country_not_supported: Currently your country is not supported in the system.

setpassword.title: Set your password
setpassword.description: A minimum of 8 characters, one capital letter, one special character, and one number are mandatory.

setgoalamount.goal_amount_description: How much do you need to reach your Goal?

choosegoalcurrency.please_unlock_currencies_to_auto_adjust_: please unlock currencies to auto adjust allocations

selectCryptoCurrency.description_text: Tap on a Card to add a Coin to your Portfolio.

setgoaldate.goal_date_description: When do you want to reach your Goal?

goalsummary.description: Your Allocation is how your incoming funds will be invested.

confirmYourCountry.title: Confirm your country
confirmYourCountry.could_not_load_countries_please_retry:
Could not load countries! 
Please retry.

customizeCryptoCurrency.description: Use the plus, minus and lock buttons to customize how your incoming funds will be invested. Unlocked coins will adjust automatically.

goalinvestconfirm.description: Awesome job creating your Goal! Your investment journey awaits. To get started, let us securely verify your identity.

kycAddressScreen.title: Address

KycDobScreen.title: Date of birth
KycDobScreen.olderThan18: You need to be older than 18 to use our service
KycDobScreen.youngerThan110: You need to be younger than 110 to use our service
KycDobScreen.cannotSelectFutureDate: Please select a date prior to today's date

kycUniqueIdentification.title: Let's securely verify your identity
kycUniqueIdentification.consent: I give B21 Invest permission to search multiple databases to gather the following pieces of information about me

kycConfirmEmail.title: Confirm your email
kycConfirmEmail.description: Tap the link in the email we sent to
kycConfirmEmail.verificationLinkSend: Kindly tap on email verification link sent to your registered email Id
kycConfirmEmail.checkEmailAndContactSupport: Please check your email and if you are still facing the problem, please email support@b21.io and quote the email which you are using.
kycConfirmEmail.emailNotVerified: Your email has yet not been verified, please verify to continue.

kycSourceOfFundsScreen.title: Please select the source of your funds

kycDocumentUploadScreen.title: For extra security, add the following
kycDocumentUploadScreen.add_photo_id_description: Add a photo of your valid passport or driving licence.
kycDocumentUploadScreen.upload_utility_bill_description: Add a photo of your utility bill as proof of your address.

congratulationScreen.title: Congratulations!
congratulationScreen.description: You have provided everything we need from you in order to verify your identity as a full-fledged B21 Investor. Now let's enter some quick payment details to complete your investment.

menuScreen.please_complete_kyc_to_continue: Please complete KYC process to continue.

debitCardSelectPaymentIntrument.do_want_to_invest_another_debit_card_for: Do you want to add another debit card for this investment?

investmentAmount.description: How much you want to invest today?

investmentAmount.investmentAmtLessThan: Investment amount should be less than

investmentTransactionSummmary.success_desc: It usually takes 2-3 days for your funds to clear and get invested in your allocation. You will be notified once this is done.
investmentTransactionSummmary.failure_desc: Re-enter the payment information or try a different payment method

investmentCashBalanceTransactionSummmary.success_desc: It usually takes 2-3 days for your funds to clear and get invested in your Allocation. You will be notified once this is done.
investmentCashBalanceTransactionSummmary.failure_desc: We are unable to withdraw your funds at this time. Please wait and try again later, or try a different withdraw method
